ingredients: 2 cups elbow macaroni (or similar type pasta)
2 cups whole or 2% milk (warmed in the microwave for 1 min)
1/2 tsp ground mustard (*add 1/2 tsp more if you want more of a kick)
1 cup freshly shredded sharp cheddar cheese
1/2 cup freshly shredded pepper jack cheese
steps: Pour your macaroni noodles into lightly salted boiling water. Cook until Al dente
Add 3 tbps of unsalted butter to a large pot and cook until completely melted
Add 3 tbps of flour into the same pot and whisk for about 1-2 mins on medium heat. It should be light brown
Add your milk into the pot a little bit a time. Whisk each time you pour the milk, and whisk until creamy.
Mix up all your seasonsings in a small bowl and then add it to the pot.
Add the shredded cheese one at a time. Whisk until smooth and melted.
Now turn off the heat and the macaroni noodles into the pot. Stir until evenly combined.
